programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent

Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.desc: In this episode, we’re making a family classic: fish and chips, with a healthy twist so it’s perfect for kids. Then we ‘fight the fussy’ by tactically using veg to make sure your kids get their 5 a day, featuring special guest, Ciara Attwell.

programme.title: Fridge Raid Breakfast Frittatas and Mac and Squeeze
programme.desc: Nic and Ian knock up a nutritious breakfast that’ll get your kids fed and ready for a day of school, featuring special guest: Dy Rupy from The Doctor’s Kitchen. Then, they twist up a popular dish and create a no-rules, mac and squeeze- because there’s nothing better than home-cooked goodness.

programme.title: One Tray Bake and Hangry Hacks
programme.desc: Nic and Ian cook up a one pot wonder meal that’s simple, delicious and easy. Then they battle the hanger by cooking up some snacks which will keep your kids full and satisfied; featuring special guest, Charlotte Stirling Reed.

programme.title: Food for Thought and the Proof is in the Pudding
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll be exploring the foods that feed the belly and fuel the brain! Nic and Ian cook up some sweet treats that’ll perk up anyone’s school night dinner! Featuring guest chef, Selasi Gbormittah.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 City Breaks Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Get dazzled by the diamond-studded Parliament House, seek warmth in the thermal springs and sail away on the Danube only on City Breaks - Budapest.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Quebec, Canada
programme.desc: From the famous deer meat pie of Aux Ancies Canadiens to the art on Rue Du Tresor, Alex Drobin soaks in the vibes of sophisticated yet playful Quebec.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Zodiac fountain and then Jaffa Port. She then explores National Park in Caesarea. Ending the episode as learns about Baha'i faith.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Peru Ica Nazca
programme.desc: Milagros’s first stop to showcase her country is at Ica on Peru’s southern coast known for its vineyards and for the desert oasis, Huacachina.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Burn Appetit Riegersberg, Austria
programme.desc: On the way to Graz from Vienna, Jolly makes an unexpected discovery: a medieval castle on a volcano, which is home to a dungeon of witches.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Fact Fun Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Alex Drobin gets to know the vibe of Toronto at significant spots such as Saint Lauren’s Market and Sir Henry’s Garage for Classic Cars.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Acre, starting from El Jazzar mosque and Citadel fortress. Next day she travels to Mizpe Hayamim and then explores the town of Capernaum.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Burn Appetit Graz, Austria
programme.desc: Set among the farms and vineyards of Styria, the city of Graz has quietly become the culinary crowning jewel of Austria.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence (ENG)
programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Food Fact Fun Niagara, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts in Niagara with a 5 course meal along with enjoying dance performances near the Niagara falls. Next, exploring the urban space, he visits the Skylon town for a stunning view of the city. Further he visits the Niagara-on-the-lake village and explores its surroundings. He then interacts with a wine expert to learn more about the regional wines. Lastly, Alex is seen exploring the Niagara falls by helicopter, the a tunnel that takes him to the observation desk and then by ferry.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina is in Tiberias, known for its natural hot springs, here she visits the Sea of Galilee. In Nezareth she visits the cave of Mary, ending with Via Dolorosa in Jerusalem.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Burn Appetit Alpbach, Austria
programme.desc: Jolly leaves behind the Styrian region and heads to the Alps, on his adventure across Austria, where gastronomy meets adrenalin.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Great World Hotels Dieswaene (ENG)
programme.desc: Elisha gets some old-world style pampering at Die Swaene, a luxury boutique hotel situated in the heart of the historic center of Bruges.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina in Jerusalem, takes a guided tour of City of David and visits Western Wall, learning about its significance. Ending with Cardo and Mahane Yehuda Markets.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Burn Appetit Rattenberg, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 World Heritage Ancient Cities of Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The central plains of Sri Lanka are dotted with crumbling temples, lost cities and ruins of sacred Buddhist sites. It was here that ancient Sinhalese dynasties set up their capitals and supported massive artistic and architectural endeavors. Sigiriya, the ancient fortress atop a 66o-feet-high rock soaring out of a forest, and Polonnaruwa, the epitome of ancient Buddhist architecture, with its refined carvings, are but a few of the sites now ranking as national treasures.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Food Fact Fun Vancouver Island, Canada
programme.desc: Alex is in Vancouver Island and calls for Saffron salmon at Modern Cafe. Next he visits “Red fish blue fish” a fish and chip shop and tries freshly prepared seafood. Further explores the Parksville beach for its sand sculptures and then explores a 50 year old Symphony Winery. Further Alex visits “Eagle wing whale watching” for fun and knowledge about the ocean life. To add to the adventure rush he tries motocross and then snorkels in cold waters of Nanaimo.

programme.title: Backpack

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.desc: The third FWT Challenger delivered an unforgettable day full of action on the legendary Mont Gond wall. Perfect conditions for the 63 riders from all over Europe, the USA, New Zealand and Japan.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2016 - The Heroes
programme.desc: Every year since 2008, the world's best freeride skiers and snowboarders have competed for the world championship title in the Freeride World Tour. Thanks to the top sporting performances, the tour has become an integral part of the international winter sports calendar.

programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Iceland Traverse - Mountain Bike Expedition - Iceland
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to go through Iceland by mountain bike. Unlike touring bikers, they want to explore the best single trails. They developed a plan to conquer the deep rivers, snow fields and sandy sections along the way.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Geneva (SUI)

Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: The ABSA Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 648 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15 475m of climbing.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 7
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn Pro (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt!

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2018 - Freeride World Tour 2018 - Stop 1 - Kicking Horse_
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #5 - Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)

programme.desc: Experience 24 minutes of adrenaline-fueled feats as Nicholi Rogatkin (USA) and Casey Brown (CAN) take viewers through the final highlight edit of the 2023 Swatch Nines Mountain Bike event at Germany's Green Hill Bikepark, held from the 14th to the 19th of August.

programme.title: If it’s easy it’s not fun
programme.desc: Join us on a beatiful adventures through the sky and desert of Jordan, where three french friends seek for adrenalin and creacks in the sandstone of Wadirum (JOR).

programme.title: Climb
programme.desc: Triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One year later he an his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary

programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania

programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A stacked SUPERFIGHT SERIES card is headlined by former welterweight champion Murthel ‘The Predator’ Groenhart (68-23-3, 39 KO’s) and rising threat Alim Nabiyev (50-7, 21 KO’s). The winner will forcefully insert his name into the title shot conversation.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Two world title fights headline GLORY 64 STRASBOURG on Saturday, March 9 as GLORY makes its first visit to the historic French city.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Micheletti takes on Susperregui in the main event of the GLORY 69 Super Fight Series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: California’s Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ Van Soest 20-4-1 (6 KO’s) seeks to snatch the super-bantamweight title from the seemingly-unbeatable Anissa Meksen (99-4, 32 KO’s) of Paris, France.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Brazilian GLORY middleweight champion Alex ‘Po Atan’ Pereira (31-6, 20 KO’s) headlines the GLORY 74 ARNHEM section of the card, putting his title on the line against Ertugul Bayrak (18-6, 5 KO’s) in a main event fight set for five rounds.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: COLLISION 2 is headlined by GLORY world heavyweight champion Rico ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Verhoeven (55-10, 16 KO’s) and his arch-rival Badr Hari (106-13,92 KO’s), rematching three years on from their first epic encounter.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The main event will see two of the light heavyweight division’s most explosive young prospects clash as Romania’s Stefan Latescu (17-3, 8 KO) faces Turkey’s Cem Caceres (16-1, 13 KO). Belgium based Albanian Berjan Peposhi (29-4, 16 KO) will compete in the co-main event. The always exciting featherweight welcomes rising star Ayoub Bourass (14-1, 4 KO) in to make his GLORY debut. International Muay Thai superstar Youssef Boughanem (188-43-8, 120 KO) returns for his sophomore GLORY outing against tough Italian Angelo Volpe (38-5, 12 KO). Former middleweight title contender Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-10, 36 KO) takes on Antwerp’s own Jente Nnamadim (21-5, 11 KO), who comes in to make his GLORY...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: California’s Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ Van Soest 20-4-1 (6 KO’s) seeks to snatch the super-bantamweight title from the seemingly-unbeatable Anissa Meksen (99-4, 32 KO’s) of Paris, France.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Brazilian GLORY middleweight champion Alex ‘Po Atan’ Pereira (31-6, 20 KO’s) headlines the GLORY 74 ARNHEM section of the card, putting his title on the line against Ertugul Bayrak (18-6, 5 KO’s) in a main event fight set for five rounds.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: COLLISION 2 is headlined by GLORY world heavyweight champion Rico ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Verhoeven (55-10, 16 KO’s) and his arch-rival Badr Hari (106-13,92 KO’s), rematching three years on from their first epic encounter.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: World featherweight champion Petchpanomrung (163-36-3, 27 KO’s) headlines the card, traveling from Bangkok, Thailand to defend his title belt against former champion Serhii Adamchuk (40-11, 15 KO’s), from Ukraine but fighting out of Mike’s Gym in Amsterdam.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari battles Benjamin Adegbuyi in a heavyweight contender fight plus the long-awaited rubber match title fight between Cédric Doumbé and Murthel Groenhart. Rounding out the fight card of GLORY 76 is an exciting 4-man heavyweight tournament featuring top fighters Antonio Plazibat, Nordine Mahieddine, Levi Rigters, and Massinissa Hamaili.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: 6 Champions, 3 Title Fights, 1 Special Night. The main event features a four man heavyweight tournament including Glory heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven, as well as Hesdy Gerges, Levi Rigters and Tarik Khbabez.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. GLORY featherweight world champion Petch (169-40-3, 27 KO) and RISE national champion Kento Haraguchi (25-3-1, 14 KO) made their trilogy fight official for the co-main event. programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.sub-title: S01 : E157 The Good Son S1 E157
programme.desc: Raja Beta is an Indian television drama series that revolves around the life of Vedant Tripathi, an ideal and dutiful son. Vedant is adopted by the Tripathi family and grows up to become a successful gynecologist. Despite facing challenges and prejudice due to his adopted status, he wins the love and respect of his family through his unwavering dedication, kindness, and sense of responsibility.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E157 Undercover Love S1 E157
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Untangled
programme.desc: Diya, a gully badminton player, meets Arjun, a former badminton champ from an affluent family, who resents his own kin. Will Diya bring back the much-needed positivity and hope in Arujns life?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E157 Dholi Beats S1 E157
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E157 King of Hearts S1 E157
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E157 Second Chances S1 E157
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Jodha Akbar S2 E11
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E157 This is Fate S1 E157
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Episodes 4 and 5
programme.desc: The Yardies want revenge for their fallen friend.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Kane learns a valuable lesson on his first job with Rafe.

programme.title: Episodes 7 and 8
programme.desc: Fresh returns to Flatbush for a surprise visit. Miz gets word of impending war.

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.desc: Rafe makes a new friend. Tai puts his plans in motion.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Miz and Rafe both settle old scores. The guys attend a wake. The police finally catch up with Shane.

programme.title: Eve of Destruction
programme.desc: An anti-terrorist (Gregory Hines) tracks a walking bomb modeled after its creator (Renée Soutendijk).

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In finds out that his grandfather revised his will and the inheritance condition is to marry Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon can't trust Jae In, and she is not interested in marriage. So, he makes a new suggestion to her.

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon finds out Jae In's colorful history of dating and she got angry as she remembers the kiss with him.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon heard Jae In said Da Hyeon is not special. Da Hyeon, who got hurt in pride, prepares to revenge.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: An urgent matter comes up to Jae In and Da Hyeon waits for him. They missed each other as their paths crossed.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: On Jae In's birthday, Da Hyeon prepares a special gift. Meanwhile, a man approaches Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon's house was robbed. Jae In is anxious to leave her alone, he brings her to his house.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon attend Jae In's event and she meets Ju Hee, who was almost engaged with Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In, who suddenly took over the company, naturally moved away from Da Hyeon, and they miss each other.

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: 1% of Something

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon
programme.desc: Ma Eum’s ideas to improve "Princess Kumiho" revive its fanbase, and Jun Yeong receives an offer from Mr. Heo.

programme.title: Today's Webtoon
programme.desc: Ma Eum struggles to mentor rookies at Webtoon Camp, while her father discovers she’s no longer pursuing judo.

programme.title: Today's Webtoon
programme.desc: Ma Eum defends new artist Seul Ah and learns about Producer Kwon’s past.

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon
programme.desc: Man Cheol convinces artist Hae Kyu to remake a cartoon as a webtoon, while Ma Eum helps care for his daughter.

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon

programme.title: Today's Webtoon
